title: Odom suffered 12 strokes
text:
Lamar Odom suffered 12 strokes news.com.au Lamar Odom suffered 12 strokes news.com.au Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian in February 2011. 
LAMAR Odom reportedly suffered 12 strokes early on in his medical emergency. 
TMZ reports doctors performed a series of brain scans on Lamar and discovered the strokes, which are said to have had an impact on his ability to walk and talk. 
His medical team are unaware if the damage is permanent, but he will need months of physical therapy to determine. 
His kidneys, which have failed, are the immediate priority and he may need a transplant. 
It was reported on Saturday that Odom reportedly underwent emergency surgery as he continues to fight for his life in a Los Angeles hospital. 
The operation is said to be connected to a bout of pneumonia, according to People magazine. Other Stories
